QuestData.Title: Shadumbra's Head
QuestData.Description: The once swift Shadumbra now lies still as you claim victory over it.$b$bThis legenday creature is dear to the night elves. Its head should serve as an intimidating trophy, and as a sign of the end of the Alliance in Ashenvale.$b$bCaptain Goggath at Hellscream's Watch will no doubt be delighted to receive the head of the slain nightsaber.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Shadumbra's Head to Captain Goggath at Hellscream's Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: Shadumbra's Head?$b$bNone can say how many of our Horde brethren have fallen to this beast over the years. Your prowess has ensured that no more shall suffer this fate.$b$bWarchief Hellscream shall hear of your deeds, $c.
